org.apache.ignite.mxbean

Interface MemoryMetricsMXBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MemoryMetrics

    @MXBeanDescription(value="MBean that provides access to MemoryMetrics of a local Apache Ignite node.")
public interface MemoryMetricsMXBean
extends MemoryMetrics
    This interface defines a JMX view on MemoryMetrics.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disableMetrics()
      Disables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.
      void enableMetrics()
      Enables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.
      float getAllocationRate()
      Gets pages allocation rate of a memory region.
      float getEvictionRate()
      Gets eviction rate of a given memory region.
      int getInitialSize()
      Gets initial memory region size defined by its MemoryPolicyConfiguration.
      float getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage()
      Gets percentage of pages that are fully occupied by large entries that go beyond page size.
      int getMaxSize()
      Maximum memory region size defined by its MemoryPolicyConfiguration.
      String getName()
      A name of a memory region the metrics are collected for.
      float getPagesFillFactor()
      Gets the percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.
      String getSwapFilePath()
      A path to the memory-mapped files the memory region defined by MemoryPolicyConfiguration will be mapped to.
      long getTotalAllocatedPages()
      Gets a total number of allocated pages in a memory region.
      void rateTimeInterval(int rateTimeInterval)
      Sets time interval for getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() monitoring purposes.
      void subIntervals(int subInts)
      Sets a number of sub-intervals the whole rateTimeInterval(int) will be split into to calculate getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() rates (5 by default).

      • getEvictionRate

float getEvictionRate()
        Gets eviction rate of a given memory region.
        Specified by:
        getEvictionRate in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Number of evicted pages per second.

      • getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Percentage of pages that are fully occupied by large entries that go beyond page size.")
float getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage()
        Gets percentage of pages that are fully occupied by large entries that go beyond page size. The large entities are split into fragments in a way so that each fragment can fit into a single page.
        Specified by:
        getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Percentage of pages fully occupied by large entities.

      • getPagesFillFactor

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.")
float getPagesFillFactor()
        Gets the percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.
        Specified by:
        getPagesFillFactor in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        The percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.

      • enableMetrics

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Enables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.")
void enableMetrics()
        Enables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.

      • disableMetrics

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Disables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.")
void disableMetrics()
        Disables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.

      • rateTimeInterval

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Sets time interval for pages allocation and eviction monitoring purposes.")
@MXBeanParametersNames(value="rateTimeInterval")
@MXBeanParametersDescriptions(value="Time interval (in seconds) to set.")
void rateTimeInterval(int rateTimeInterval)
        Sets time interval for getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() monitoring purposes.

        For instance, after setting the interval to 60 seconds, subsequent calls to getAllocationRate() will return average allocation rate (pages per second) for the last minute.

        Parameters:
        rateTimeInterval - Time interval used for allocation and eviction rates calculations.

      • subIntervals

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Sets a number of sub-intervals to calculate allocation and eviction rates metrics.")
@MXBeanParametersNames(value="subInts")
@MXBeanParametersDescriptions(value="Number of subintervals to set.")
void subIntervals(int subInts)
        Sets a number of sub-intervals the whole rateTimeInterval(int) will be split into to calculate getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() rates (5 by default).

        Setting it to a bigger value will result in more precise calculation and smaller drops of getAllocationRate() metric when next sub-interval has to be recycled but introduces bigger calculation overhead.

        Parameters:
        subInts - A number of sub-intervals.
